rules.ruleString: (Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {ACX4000, AFX4000} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS} AND  Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {AFX4010} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS})
Must be enrolled in course type {03, 04}

description: Under supervision, students are expected to undertake and report on an original research topic that addresses a contemporary and/or a significant issue in the field of  accounting, banking and finance, insurance or risk management. Students must find a suitable supervisor, have selected an appropriate area of research and have obtained the approval of their course director before undertaking in this unit.
